enable-sonicmod.name: Enable Mod
enable-sonicmod.description:
Allows for toggling the mod's functions on/off without the need for disabling the entire mod and restarting the game. 

 Will need a level restart on change!

selected-sprite.name: Game Sprite (READ INFO)
selected-sprite.description:
Chooses which sonic game sprites' the mod will use. classic1 is Sonic 1, classic2 is Sonic 2, etc! 

 <cr>Requires level restart to properly apply if changed mid-gameplay.</c>

enable-sfx.name: Enable SFX
enable-sfx.description: Enables playing Sonic sound effects on certain in-game events!

global-sfx.name: Global SFX
global-sfx.description: Defines whether or not should sound effects be played regardless of gamemode. If on, Sonic SFX will play on any gamemode, if off (by default) SFX will only play when in Robot gamemode, aka, when Sonic is present.

jump-sfx.name: Jump SFX
jump-sfx.description: The Sound Effect to play on Robot Jump.

orb-sfx.name: Orb SFX
orb-sfx.default: The Sound Effect to play on Orb use.

dash-start-sfx.name: Dash Orb Start SFX
dash-start-sfx.description: The Sound Effect to play when a dash orb is used.

dash-stop-sfx.name: Dash Orb Stop SFX
dash-stop-sfx.description: The Sound Effect to play when a dash orb is released.

pad-sfx.name: Pad SFX
pad-sfx.description: The Sound Effect to play when a bump pad is used. (Doesn't play on Spider & Blue pads)

gravswitch-sfx.name: Gravity Switch SFX
gravswitch-sfx.description: The Sound Effect to play when switching gravity.

disable-compat.name: Disable Sprite Hiding
disable-compat.description:
Disables the compatibility option that explicitly hides the vanilla robot sprites themselves. 

 This option fixes compatibility with Globed players, but WILL break with mods like Separate Dual Icons and/or Randomize Icon or Death. 
 Use carefully! (Default: off)

name: Sonic Robot
description: Mod that turns the robot gamemode into Sonic!
